base_description: White rectangular cabinet with brown handles.
part_description: Two doors with brown handles, rectangular shape, rounded top edges, four small black feet at corners.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors are hinged on the sides, allowing them to swing open and closed. The handles are positioned vertically on the outer edge of each door for easy gripping. The rounded top edges add to the aesthetic while ensuring safety by minimizing sharp corners.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed on flat surfaces due to its stable feet. It interacts with users through the handles, which facilitate opening and closing the doors. The cabinet can store items inside, interacting with household or office environments by organizing and concealing contents.
